alert.note: Alert for Duval; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 9:32PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN DUVAL...EAST CENTRAL WEBB AND SOUTHWESTERN MCMULLEN COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 PM CDT... At 932 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Seven Sisters, or 14 miles north of Freer, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Freer and Seven Sisters. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 760 and 782. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
